name: Envelope Follower
description:
This algorithm is a simple envelope follower. It outputs a CV according to the volume envelope of the input audio.
When operating on stereo (or multichannel) signals, it tracks the maximum of the various signals and outputs a single CV. If you want to separately track the left and right sides of a stereo signal, use this algorithm configured as two mono channels.
short_description: "Tracks the volume envelope of a signal"

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: The number of busses to process, starting from the Input. For example, for a stereo signal, set this to 2.

parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: The output bus. If set to ‘None’, the input bus is used as output, and the mode is always ‘Replace'.

parameters.name:
Output
mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.

parameters.name: Attack
parameters.description: The follower attack time. Exponential scale from 0.1ms to 1000ms.

parameters.name: Release
parameters.description: The follower release time. Ex exponential scale from 1.0ms to 3000ms.
